EASTERN MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
DNC 09.
1. VESSEL, 34 PERSONS ON BOARD, ADRIFT. LAST KNOWN
   POSITION IN 33-42.00N 018-56.00E AT 030718Z NOV.
   VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO
   KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
   REPORTS TO  JRCC LIBYA,
   PHONE: 2189 1034 9739, 2182 1444 9149,
   FAX: 2182 1360 6868,
   E-MAIL: LMRCC.1@MOD.GOV.LY,
   LMRCC.2@MOD.GOV.LY.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 2789/22.
